summary: slim face head mesh. No esp or esm files included
descriptionHtml:
At the request of a fellow gamer, I quickly put together this head mesh that can be used to portray a slim adult female face. Just thought I should share it with the public as well.

This is just a mesh file with no esm or esp attached. I haven't got time to fiddle with that atm. Feel free to use it to make your own mods.

If you just put it in Skyrim's directories, it will affect the player's character only me thinks. Here's where you need to put it by the way: Data/Meshes/Actors/Character/character assets

If you want to make this affect all female NPCs in the game you may be able to do so by regenerating NPC face geometries in CK by selecting target NPCs and pressing Ctrl + F4. Note I haven't tested this out myself so do it at your own risk.

You should also be able to use it for male characters by changing the filename to "malehead" I believe. But once again I haven't tested out so there's no guarantee that it'll work.

Screenshots were taken with Climates of Tamriel and Project Enb installed

Please do report bugs and glitches and suggestions for improvements

Recommended mods:
Race menu - http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?
author: h1zchan
